import React, { useState} from 'react'; // import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import './'; const Popup = (props) => { const [issubmit, setIsSubmit] = useState(false); return props.trigger ? (
{!issubmit ? ( <>

Are you Looking for Sell your Products

) : (
Thank you Our Team Reach you Soon.
)}
) : ( '' ); }; export default Popup;
